p: In order to image LDs and to investigate their maturation at different times, the 2,845 cm -1 CH 2 stretching mode was investigated. The pump beam was set at 810 nm and the probe wavelength was set at 1,053 nm. SRS images, acquired at a fixed focal plane by a 2.5x scanning zoom, of day 5, day 10 and day 15 samples, are shown in the middle column of Fig 2A. Each SRS image was obtained by averaging ten images acquired under the same experimental conditions. LDs and their distribution inside adipocytes were clearly visualized ( Fig 2A). To better point out the effect of differentiation process, in the first column of Fig 2A the transmission images of day 5, day 10 and day 15 samples are reported, while in the last column of Fig 2A the merge image of two modalities, i.e. transmission and SRS images, are shown, too.
